chapter.text: ttuleu san-eulo maengsehasa
gilogdoen seongseolo maengsehamyeo
geugeos-eun pyeolchyeojin yangpijie gilog doen geos-ila
gyeongbaehagi wihae bangmun-i jaj-eun ka-euba sinjeon-eulo maengsehamyeo
nop-eun haneullo maengsehamyeo
manjoga doen badalo maengsehanani
geudae junim-ui beol-eun bandeusi nae lil geos-ila
eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul pihal su eobsnola
haneul-i jindonghaneun nal
geuligo sandeul-i hwinallineun nal
geunal-eul geoyeoghan jadeul-ege jae ang-i iss-eul geos-ila
geudeul-eun heowie molduhan jadeullo
geunal-e solichimyeo buljieug-eulo kkeullyeogani
igeos-i balo neohuiga geoyeoghaess deon buljiog-ila malhayeo jideola
igeosdo masul-inyo animyeon neo huiga bojileul moshaneunyo
geugos-eulo deul-eoga masbola neohuiga geugeos-eul innaehadeon ttoneun innae haji moshadeon geugeos-eun neohui haeng-wie daehan bosang-ila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun eunhye ui cheongug-eulo deul-eoga
junimkkeseo geudeul-ege bepul chug bog-eul mankkighago ttohan geudeul-ui junim eun buljiog-ui eungbeollobuteo geudeul-eul bohohayeo jusinola
yuighago jeulgeoi meoggo masi la neohuiui haeng-wie daehan gyeolgwalaneun malsseum-i iss-eulila
geudeul-i chimsang-e juljieo gidae ni hananim-eun geudeul-ege nun-i keun aleumdaun baeujaleul anjge hasideola

mid-eum-eul gajin jawa geudeul-eul ttala mid-eum-eul gajin husondeul-i issnani hananim-eun husondeul-eul geudeulgwa hamkke gyeolhabsikyeo julila ttohan hananim-eun geudeul-i haenghan geosdeul-eul gamhaji anh-eul geos-ila modeun ingan-eun geuga haenghan geos-e daehan chaeg-im-i issnola
hananim-eun geudeul-i wonhaneun gwa silgwa yuglyuleul buyeohani
geudeul-eun seologa seolo-ege hae ag-i eobsneun jan-eul jugo bad-eul ttae
jinjucheoleom jal bogwandoen sonyeon-i geudeul juwileul dolmyeo sijungdeuldoda
geudeul-eun seologa seolo-ege da gaseomyeo anbuleul mul-eumae
sillo jeohuineun hyeonseeseo uli baegseongdeullo inhayeo dulyeowo haessnaidalago daedabdeul hanila
geuleona hananim-eun uliege eunhyeleul bepusa jag-yeolhaneun yeolpung-ui beollobuteo ulileul guhayeo jusyeossnola
sillo ulineun ijeon-e hananim kke guwonhayeoss-eumae geubun-eun eunhewa jabilo chungmanhasinila
geuleomeulo hungyehala geudaeneun junim-ui eunhyeleul bad-eun jalo jeomjang-ido animyeo michinjado anila
animyeon siin-iyeo sigan-i heu leum-e ttala geuege eotteon jaeang-i nae lil geos-ilago geudeul-i malhadeonyo
illeogalodoe neohuiga gidalila nado yeogsi neohuiwa hamkke gidalinola
geudeul-ui iseong-i igeos-eul jong-yonghandan mal-inyo animyeon geudeul-i saag han baegseongdeul-inyo
animyeon geuga geu mesejileul wijohayeossda geudeul-i malhaneunyo geuleoh ji anhnola geudeul-i mid-eum-eul geoyeoghal ppun-ila
geudeul-i sasil-ilamyeon geuwa gat eun malsseum-eul geudeullo hayeogeum ileuge hala
geudeul-eun seuseulo changjodoeeossneunyoanimyeon geudeul seuseuloga jomulju-ideonyo
animyeon geudeul-i haneulgwa daeji leul changjohayeossda hadeonyo geuleohji a nihani geudeul-egeneun hwaggohan mid-eum-i eobs-eul ppun-ila
junim-ui bomul-i geudeul-ege iss da hadeonyo animyeon geudeul-aege jeoldae jeog gwonneung-i issdago hadeonyo
animyeon geudeul-i haneul-e olla bimil-eul deul-eul sadalilado gajigo issneunyo geuleohdamyeon geu bimil-eul deul-eoss deon jalo hayeogeum myeongbaeghan jeung-geoleul ibjeunghala
neohuineun adeul-i issneunde hana nim-eun ttaldeulman issdaneun geos-inyo
geudaega geudeul-ege bosang-eul yoguhayeo geudeul-i buchaelo mugeoun jim eul jige doeeossdan mal-inyo
animyeon geudeul-ege boiji anh neun geos-i iss-eo geugeos-eul giloghago issneunyo
animyeon geudeul-i geudaee daeha yeo eummoleul kkumineunyo hananimkke do jeonhaneun ja seuseulo geu eummo-e ppajige doenola
animyeon geudeul-egeneun hananim anin daleun sin-i issda hadeonyo geudeul-i sungbaehaneun modeun geos wie gyesineunhananim-iyeo heullo yeong-gwang bad-eusoseo
geudeul-eun geudeul wie tteol-eojineun haneul-ui jogag-eul bogoseodo igeos-eun guleumdeong-eolilago geudeul-eun malhal geos-ila
geuleomeulo geudeul-i gongpolo sseu leojineun geunal-eul maj-ihal ttaekkaji geu deul-eul beolyeodula
geunal-i doemae geudeul-ui eummoneun geudeul-eul yuyongke haji moshago guwon do badji moshanola
sillo joeag-eul jeojileun jadeul-e geneun geugeos oeedo tto daleun beol-i iss-eul geos-ila geuleona geudeul daedasu neun alji moshadeola
geuleomeulo innaehamyeo geudae ju nim-ui simpan-eul gidalila sillo geudae neun hananim-i geudaeleul bohohago iss nola geuligo nega il-eoseol ttae geudaejunim-eul chanmihala
bamjung-edo geuligo byeoldeul-i jil ttaeedo hananim-eul chanmihala
